prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a playful swimmer with orange fur and blue accents.
I want a Pokemon that evolves from a small aquatic creature into a larger, more powerful one with unique features.
Generate a Pokemon that uses its speed and agility in battles, with striking orange and yellow colors.
Make a design for a water-themed Pokemon that loves to play in rivers and lakes, showcasing a fun personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek body shape and vibrant colors that can adapt to both land and water habitats.
Show me a Pokemon with distinctive flippers and a cheerful demeanor, perfect for a competitive aquatic environment.
Design a playful aquatic creature that has a unique swimming technique and striking orange fur with yellow accents.
